00021 /*! file main.cpp This file contains a command line program to convert a GCOS CHP file to Calvin format. */
00022 
00023 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/src/CHPFileConverter.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/src/CmdLine.h"
00025 //
00026 #include <cstdlib>
00027 #include <cstring>
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <string>
00030 //
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace affymetrix_chp_converter;
00034 
00035 /*! The input file tag. */
00036 #define INPUT_FILE_ARG "-i"
00037 
00038 /*! The help tag. */
00039 #define HELP_ARG "-h"
00040 
00041 /*! The version tag. */
00042 #define VERSION_ARG "-v"
00043 
00044 /*! The library path tag. */
00045 #define LIB_PATH_ARG "-l"
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * Show a help message.
00049  */
00050 void ShowHelp()
00051 {
00052         cout
00053                 << "Command line arguments:"
00054                 << endl
00055                 << "\t" << INPUT_FILE_ARG << " <the full path of the input GCOS CHP file to convert>"
00056                 << endl
00057                 << "\t" << LIB_PATH_ARG << " <the path to where the library (CDF/PSI) files reside>"
00058                 << endl
00059                 << "\t" << VERSION_ARG << " <1 = convert to GCOS XDA, 2 = convert to Calvin>"
00060                 << endl;
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * The options for the converter.
00065  */
00066 typedef struct _ConverterOptions
00067 {
00068         CHPFileVersionType version;
00069         string fileName;
00070         string libPath;
00071 
00072 } ConverterOptions;
00073 
00074 /*
00075  * Get the file name and library path from the command line arguments.
00076  * Show the help if required.
00077  */
00078 bool GetArguments(int argc, char **argv, ConverterOptions &options)
00079 {
00080         CCmdLine cmdLine;
00081 
00082         // parse argc,argv 
00083         // no switches were given on the command line, abort
00084         if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00085         {
00086                 ShowHelp();
00087                 return false;
00088         }
00089 
00090         // test for the 'help' case
00091         if (cmdLine.HasSwitch(HELP_ARG))
00092         {
00093                 ShowHelp();
00094                 return false;
00095         }
00096 
00097         // get the required argument
00098         try
00099         {
00100                 string str;
00101                 options.fileName = cmdLine.GetArgument(INPUT_FILE_ARG, 0);
00102                 options.libPath = cmdLine.GetArgument(LIB_PATH_ARG, 0);
00103                 str = cmdLine.GetArgument(VERSION_ARG, 0);
00104                 options.version = (CHPFileVersionType)(atoi(str.c_str()));
00105         }
00106         catch (...)
00107         {
00108                 // one of the required arguments was missing, abort
00109                 ShowHelp();
00110                 return false;
00111         }
00112         return true;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*
00116  * Extract the information from the Calvin data file and dump it to the command line.
00117  */
00118 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00119 {
00120         // Get the input file name.
00121         ConverterOptions options;
00122         if (GetArguments(argc, argv, options) == false)
00123                 return -1;
00124 
00125         // Test if it is a calvin file.
00126         CHPFileConverter converter;
00127         if (converter.ConvertFile(options.fileName.c_str(), options.libPath.c_str(), options.version) == false)
00128         {
00129                 cout << CHPFileConverterErrorMessage(converter.ErrorCode()) << endl;
00130                 return -1;
00131         }
00132         cout << "Conversion complete." << endl;
00133         return 0;
00134 }
